unhaus/idiot-changeling.about-closet: My friends dared me to go in this spooky closet. They then locked me in… they’re just silly ‘lings. Said something about me not going outside without a disguise.
unhaus/idiot-changeling.about-race: Uhm. I’m a changeling? Did I answer right?
unhaus/idiot-changeling.about-race-extended: Oooh. You want to know more about changelings? I love helping out. I love helping friends even more. Maybe I can show you our hive. It’s very cool.
unhaus/idiot-changeling.about-race-friends: Of course. You helped me out. That means we’re friends!
unhaus/idiot-changeling.about-race-hive: Yes! Hive! It’s under the town. Very secret, shh, so don’t tell anyone.
unhaus/idiot-changeling.about-self: I'm Caput, your new changeling friend !
unhaus/idiot-changeling.about-self-extended: I am Caput! My fellow hivelings and queen said I’m only useful for menial labor. That means I must be the best menial drone around.
unhaus/idiot-changeling.ask-about-closet: Why were you stuck in the closet?
unhaus/idiot-changeling.ask-about-queen: What do you think of the queen?
unhaus/idiot-changeling.ask-to-show-hive: If we are friends, then you can surely help me out to get into your hive.
unhaus/idiot-changeling.hive-meeting: Hi there, friend. Hey can you tell me how it is outside there?
unhaus/idiot-changeling.hive-prompt-outside-bad: That doesn’t sound nice. It’s fun that we’re right here, two friends safe in the hive instead!
unhaus/idiot-changeling.hive-prompt-outside-good: I hope it gets funner then. But it’s fun enough with us two friends safe in the hive.
unhaus/idiot-changeling.meeting: Thanks for helping me out. I was kinda stuck in here.
unhaus/idiot-changeling.meeting-ans-insect: Are you one of those insect ponies ?
unhaus/idiot-changeling.prompt: Hi there. It's so nice seeing you again.
unhaus/idiot-changeling.show-hive: Of course! Just, don’t tell anyling. Follow me!
